channel.title: Charting Alberta Covid
channel.description: Recent content on Charting Alberta Covid

item.title: Schools and Students
item.description: Covid-19 Cases in Youth Covid-19 Cases in Alberta Schools See Support our Students Alberta for the complete list of schools with Covid-19 cases. See Global News' Lauren Pullen reporting for more school VOC information.

item.title: Daily Covid-19 Briefing
item.description: Daily Covid-19 Briefing Monday, May 17, 2021 - Prepared by ALPINE1 Today 731 new cases of Covid-19 were identified in the province. The adjusted total of cases is 721 including changes to previous case numbers between January 5th and May 15th. The current 7 day trend of cases is 1,051, a decrease of -7.1% from the day before. This time last week trend was 1,694. This is a decrease of -38%.

item.title: Outbreaks
item.description: Current Numbers of Outbreaks by AHS Zone Calgary Zone 128 Edmonton Zone 62 South Zone 19 Central Zone 23 North Zone 54 Covid-19 outbreaks (not including schools, see below) current as of Fri, May 14, 2021. AHS non-school outbreak data updated on Tuesdays and Fridays. Outbreak Charts Alberta Schools are not included on this map after January 18th, 2021 as the criteria for outbreaks in schools changed.

item.title: Variants of Concern
item.description: Current Covid-19 VOC Cases in Alberta Total VOC cases identified 41423 274 Total deaths from VOC 140 3 VOC specimens screened 69700 362 Covid-19 variants of concern data current as of Sun, May 16, 2021. Alberta is no longer testing all samples for VOCs, and due to previous widespread growth in VOC cases all current Covid-19 cases should be considered as VOC cases.
